insert into user_score( grade_id , score_id , designer , personal , coordinate , `month` , `year` , `date` ) value
(#{item.gradeId} ,#{item.scoreId} , #{item.designer} ,#{item.personal} ,#{item.coordinate} ,#{month} ,#{year} , #{item.date})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE designer = values(designer), personal = values(personal), coordinate = values(coordinate), `month` = values(`month`), `year` = values(`year`), `date` = values(`date`)
insert into user_score_backups(grade_id , score_id , designer , personal , coordinate , `month` , `year`) select * from user_score
mapper.select: select `month`, AVG (( designer + personal + coordinate )/ 3) AS score from user_score_backups where score_id = #{id} group by `month` order by `month` desc limit 2
